title: Real characters and real classes of $\mathrm{GL}_2$ and $\mathrm{GU}_2$ over discrete valuation rings
summary: Let $\mathfrak{o}$ be the ring of integers of a non-archimedean local field with residue field of odd characteristic, $\mathfrak{p}$ be its maximal ideal and let $\mathfrak{o}_\ell = \mathfrak{o}/\mathfrak{p}^\ell$ for $\ell\ge 2$. In this article, we study real-valued characters and real representations of the finite groups $\mathrm{GL}_2(\mathfrak{o}_\ell)$ and $\mathrm{GU}_2(\mathfrak{o}_\ell)$. We give a complete classification of real and strongly real classes of these groups and characterize the real-valued irreducible complex characters. We prove that every real-valued irreducible complex character of $\mathrm{GL}_2(\mathfrak{o}_\ell)$ is afforded by a representation over $\mathbb{R}$. In contrast, we show that $\mathrm{GU}_2(\mathfrak{o}_\ell)$ admits real-valued irreducible characters that are not realizable over $\mathbb{R}$. These results extend the parallel known phenomena for the finite groups $\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{F}_q)$ and $\mathrm{GU}_n(\mathbb{F}_q)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了非阿基米德局部域整数环上的GL₂和GU₂有限群的实值特征标与实表示，完整分类了实类和强实类，证明了GL₂的所有实值不可约复特征标都有实表示，而GU₂则存在无法实现为实表示的实值特征标。
AI.motivation: 研究非阿基米德局部域整数环上的有限群GL₂和GU₂的实表示理论，扩展有限域上GLₙ和GUₙ已知的平行现象，探索这些群在实表示方面的差异。
AI.method: 使用代数数论和群表示论方法，对GL₂(𝔬_ℓ)和GU₂(𝔬_ℓ)的实类和强实类进行完整分类，分析实值不可约复特征标，研究它们是否能实现为实表示。
AI.result: 1. 完整分类了GL₂(𝔬_ℓ)和GU₂(𝔬_ℓ)的实类和强实类；2. 刻画了实值不可约复特征标；3. 证明了GL₂(𝔬_ℓ)的每个实值不可约复特征标都有实表示；4. 发现GU₂(𝔬_ℓ)存在实值特征标无法实现为实表示。
AI.conclusion: 该研究将有限域上GLₙ和GUₙ的实表示差异现象扩展到非阿基米德局部域整数环上的对应群，揭示了GL₂和GU₂在实表示理论上的根本差异，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新见解。

title: Schur--Horn type inequalities for hyperbolic polynomials
summary: We establish a Schur--Horn type inequality for symmetric hyperbolic polynomials. As an immediate consequence, we resolve a conjecture of Nam Q. Le on Hadamard-type inequalities for hyperbolic polynomials. Our argument is based on the Schur--Horn theorem, the Birkhoff theorem, and Gårding's concavity theorem for hyperbolicity cones. Beyond the eigenvalue level, we develop a symmetrization principle on hyperbolicity cones: if a hyperbolic polynomial is invariant under a finite group action, then its value increases under the associated Reynolds operator (group averaging). Applied to the sign-flip symmetries of linear principal minor polynomials introduced by Blekherman et al., this yields a short proof of the hyperbolic Fischer--Hadamard inequalities for PSD-stable lpm polynomials.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了对称双曲多项式的Schur-Horn型不等式，解决了Nam Q. Le关于双曲多项式Hadamard型不等式的猜想，并发展了双曲锥上的对称化原理。
AI.motivation: 研究双曲多项式的Schur-Horn型不等式，解决Nam Q. Le关于双曲多项式Hadamard型不等式的猜想，并探索双曲锥上的对称化原理。
AI.method: 基于Schur-Horn定理、Birkhoff定理和Gårding关于双曲锥的凹性定理，建立了对称双曲多项式的Schur-Horn型不等式。进一步开发了双曲锥上的对称化原理：如果双曲多项式在有限群作用下不变，则其值在相关的Reynolds算子（群平均）下增加。
AI.result: 成功建立了对称双曲多项式的Schur-Horn型不等式，解决了Nam Q. Le的猜想。应用对称化原理到Blekherman等人引入的线性主次子式多项式的符号翻转对称性，得到了PSD稳定lpm多项式的双曲Fischer-Hadamard不等式的简短证明。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了双曲多项式的Schur-Horn型不等式理论，解决了重要猜想，并发展了双曲锥上的对称化原理，为双曲多项式的进一步研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Characteristic free Galois rings and generalized Weyl algebras
summary: This paper develops from scratch a theory of Galois rings and orders over arbitrary fields. Our approach is different from others in the literature in that there is no non-modularity assumption. We prove, when the field is algebraically closed, the analogue of the Main Theorem of the representation theory of Galois orders by V. Futorny and S. Ovsienko. Then we develop a theory of infinite rank generalized Weyl algebras, which was never explicitly introduced in the literature before, and prove its basic properties. We expect their representation theory to be of interest for future works. Finally we show that under very mild assumptions, the invariants of generalized Weyl algebras under the action of non-exceptional irreducible complex reflection groups are a principal Galois orders, greatly generalizing, in an elementary fashion, results obtained previously for the Weyl algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文从零开始建立了任意域上的Galois环和Galois阶理论，无需非模性假设。在代数闭域情况下证明了Galois阶表示理论的主要定理，发展了无限秩广义Weyl代数理论，并证明了在温和条件下，非例外不可约复反射群作用下广义Weyl代数的不变量是主Galois阶。
AI.motivation: 现有Galois阶理论通常需要非模性假设，本文旨在建立无需此假设的任意域上的Galois环和Galois阶理论，并扩展广义Weyl代数的表示理论。
AI.method: 从零开始构建任意域上的Galois环和Galois阶理论；在代数闭域情况下证明Galois阶表示理论的主要定理；首次明确引入无限秩广义Weyl代数理论并证明其基本性质；研究广义Weyl代数在非例外不可约复反射群作用下的不变量。
AI.result: 建立了无需非模性假设的任意域上Galois环和Galois阶理论；证明了代数闭域情况下Galois阶表示理论的主要定理；发展了无限秩广义Weyl代数理论；证明了在温和条件下，广义Weyl代数在非例外不可约复反射群作用下的不变量是主Galois阶。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了更一般的Galois阶理论框架，无需非模性假设，发展了无限秩广义Weyl代数理论，并将Weyl代数的相关结果推广到广义Weyl代数，为未来的表示理论研究提供了基础。

title: Kostant cuspidal permutations
summary: In relation to Kostant's problem for simple highest weight modules over the general linear Lie algebra, we prove a persistence result for Kostant negative consecutive patterns. Inspired by it, we introduce the notion of a Kostant cuspidal permutation as a minimal Kostant negative consecutive pattern. It is shown that Kostant cuspidality is an invariant of a Kazhdan-Lusztig left cell. We describe four infinite families of Kostant cuspidal involutions, including a complete classification of Kostant cuspidal fully commutative involutions. In particular, we show that the number of new Kostant cuspidal elements can be arbitrarily large, when the rank grows. This provides some potential explanation why Kostant's problem is hard.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了广义线性李代数上简单最高权模的Kostant问题，证明了Kostant负连续模式的持久性，引入了Kostant尖点置换的概念，并描述了四类无限族的Kostant尖点对合。
AI.motivation: 研究Kostant问题在广义线性李代数简单最高权模上的性质，特别是通过分析Kostant负连续模式来理解为什么Kostant问题如此困难。
AI.method: 证明了Kostant负连续模式的持久性结果，引入了Kostant尖点置换作为最小Kostant负连续模式的概念，展示了Kostant尖点性是Kazhdan-Lusztig左胞的不变量。
AI.result: 描述了四类无限族的Kostant尖点对合，包括完全分类了Kostant尖点完全可交换对合，并证明了当秩增长时，新的Kostant尖点元素数量可以任意大。
AI.conclusion: Kostant尖点元素数量的无界增长为解释Kostant问题的困难性提供了潜在解释，表明问题的复杂性随着代数秩的增加而显著增加。

title: Witt affine Springer theory
summary: This paper extends the affine Springer theory developed by Bouthier, Kazhdan, and the second author (see [BKV]) to the mixed characteristic case. In particular, we introduce a theory of perfectly placid perfect infinity stacks and establish their dimension theory. Furthermore, we prove that, in the Witt vector setting, the Chevalley morphism between arc spaces is flat.

AI.tldr: 将仿射Springer理论从等特征情形扩展到混合特征情形，建立了完美平坦完美无穷叠的理论及其维数理论，证明了Witt向量情形下弧空间之间Chevalley态射的平坦性
AI.motivation: 将Bouthier、Kazhdan和第二作者发展的仿射Springer理论从等特征情形扩展到混合特征情形，填补混合特征下相关理论研究的空白
AI.method: 引入完美平坦完美无穷叠的理论，建立其维数理论，在Witt向量框架下研究弧空间之间的Chevalley态射
AI.result: 成功将仿射Springer理论扩展到混合特征情形，证明了Witt向量情形下弧空间之间Chevalley态射的平坦性
AI.conclusion: 该工作为混合特征下的仿射Springer理论建立了基础框架，为后续相关研究提供了重要工具和理论基础

title: Skew-symmetrizable cluster algebras from surfaces and symmetric quivers
comment: 29 pages, many figures. v2: minor corrections
summary: We study skew-symmetrizable cluster algebras $\mathcal{A}$ associated with unpunctured surfaces $\tilde{\mathbf{S}}$ endowed with an orientation-preserving involution $σ$. We give a geometric realization of such cluster algebras by showing that cluster variables of $\mathcal{A}$ correspond to $σ$-orbits of arcs of $\tilde{\mathbf{S}}$, while clusters are given by admissible $σ$-invariant triangulations. We establish a ring homomorphism from $\mathcal{A}$ to a skew-symmetric cluster algebra of the same rank, which is combinatorially derived from $\mathcal{A}$. We use this result to provide a cluster expansion formula for any $σ$-orbit $[γ]$ in terms of perfect matchings of some labeled modified snake graphs constructed from the arcs of $[γ]$. Then, we associate a symmetric finite-dimensional algebra $A$ to any seed of $\mathcal{A}$, such that non-initial cluster variables bijectively correspond to orthogonal indecomposable $A$-modules. Finally, we exhibit a purely representation-theoretic map from the category of orthogonal $A$-modules to $\mathcal{A}$, providing a Caldero-Chapoton map in this setting.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究具有方向保持对合的未穿孔曲面上的斜对称化丛代数，给出了几何实现、建立了到斜对称丛代数的环同态、提供了丛展开公式，并建立了与对称有限维代数的表示论联系。
AI.motivation: 研究具有方向保持对合的未穿孔曲面上的斜对称化丛代数，旨在为这类代数提供几何实现，并建立其与表示论的联系，扩展Caldero-Chapoton映射的应用范围。
AI.method: 1. 使用σ轨道中的弧线几何实现丛变量；2. 建立到斜对称丛代数的环同态；3. 通过修改蛇图的完美匹配提供丛展开公式；4. 将种子与对称有限维代数关联；5. 建立正交A-模到丛代数的表示论映射。
AI.result: 1. 成功实现了具有对合的曲面丛代数的几何模型；2. 建立了到斜对称丛代数的环同态；3. 给出了σ轨道丛变量的展开公式；4. 建立了丛变量与正交不可分解A-模的双射对应；5. 构造了该设置下的Caldero-Chapoton映射。
AI.conclusion: 该论文为具有方向保持对合的未穿孔曲面上的斜对称化丛代数提供了完整的几何和表示论框架，建立了丛代数、几何曲面和表示论之间的深刻联系，扩展了Caldero-Chapoton理论的应用范围。

title: The cohomology of $BPU(p^m)$ and invariant polynomials
summary:
Let $p$ be an odd prime. For a compact Lie group $G$ and an elementary abelian $p$-group $A$ of $G$, one may define the Weyl group $W_A$ of $A$ in a similar fashion as defining the Weyl group of a maximal torus, such that $W_A$ acts on $H^*(BA;R)$ for any coefficient ring $R$, and the image of the restriction $H^*(BG;R)\to H^*(BA;R)$ lies in $H^*(BA;R)^{W_A}$, the sub-algebra of $H^*(BA:R)$ of $W_A$-invariant elements.
  In this paper, we consider the projective unitary group $PU(p^m)$ and one of its maximal elementary abelian $p$-subgroup $A_m$, of which the Weyl group is isomorphic to $Sp_{2m}(\mathbb{F}_p)$. Then the theory of $Sp_{2m}(\mathbb{F}_p)$-invariant polynomials over $\mathbb{F}_p$ may be applied to study the cohomology of $BPU(p^m)$, the classifying space of $PU(p^m)$. Following a theorem by Quillen, we deduce several theorems on $H^*(BPU(p^m);\mathbb{F}_p)$ modulo the nilradical from results on invariant polynomials.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了射影酉群PU(p^m)的分类空间BPU(p^m)的模p上同调，利用其极大初等交换p子群Am的Weyl群同构于Sp_{2m}(F_p)的性质，通过不变多项式理论来分析上同调结构。
AI.motivation: 研究射影酉群PU(p^m)的分类空间BPU(p^m)的模p上同调结构，利用Weyl群与辛群Sp_{2m}(F_p)的同构关系，将不变多项式理论应用于上同调分析。
AI.method: 对于奇素数p，考虑射影酉群PU(p^m)及其极大初等交换p子群Am，其Weyl群同构于辛群Sp_{2m}(F_p)。应用Sp_{2m}(F_p)-不变多项式理论，结合Quillen定理，研究限制映射H*(BPU(p^m);F_p)→H*(BAm;F_p)及其在不变子代数中的像。
AI.result: 通过应用Sp_{2m}(F_p)-不变多项式理论，得到了关于H*(BPU(p^m);F_p)模去幂零根的几个定理，这些结果从不变多项式的性质推导而来。
AI.conclusion: 利用射影酉群PU(p^m)的极大初等交换p子群的Weyl群与辛群Sp_{2m}(F_p)的同构关系，成功将不变多项式理论应用于研究BPU(p^m)的模p上同调结构，得到了模去幂零根后的上同调信息。

title: Steenrod Lengths and a Problem of Vakil
summary: We give an explicit combinatorial description of the function $f(n)$ governing the Steenrod length of real projective spaces $\mathbb{RP}^n$. This function arises in stable homotopy theory through the action of Steenrod squares on mod-$2$ cohomology and is closely related to the ghost length, which measures the minimal number of spheres required to construct a space up to homotopy. Building on the directed graphs $T_n$ introduced by Vakil to encode degree constraints for Steenrod operations, we interpret $f(n)$ as the length of the longest directed path starting at $n$. Using this framework, we resolve a question posed by Vakil by deriving concrete combinatorial formulas for $f(n)$ in terms of binary classes and a distinguished family of integers, which we call Vakil numbers.

AI.tldr: 该论文给出了实射影空间Steenrod长度的显式组合描述，解决了Vakil提出的问题，建立了与Vakil数的联系。
AI.motivation: 研究实射影空间ℝℙⁿ的Steenrod长度函数f(n)，该函数在稳定同伦论中通过Steenrod平方对模2上同调的作用而出现，与幽灵长度密切相关。Vakil曾提出关于该函数的问题需要解决。
AI.method: 基于Vakil引入的编码Steenrod运算次数约束的有向图T_n，将f(n)解释为从n开始的最长有向路径长度。使用此框架，通过二进制类和称为Vakil数的特殊整数族推导出f(n)的具体组合公式。
AI.result: 得到了f(n)的显式组合描述，解决了Vakil提出的问题，建立了f(n)与Vakil数的具体公式关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功解决了Vakil关于实射影空间Steenrod长度函数的问题，通过组合方法给出了该函数的显式描述，建立了与Vakil数的联系，深化了对Steenrod运算和稳定同伦论中相关结构的理解。

title: Decreasing subsequences and Viennot for oscillating tableaux
comment: 16 pages, many diagrams, color viewing essential, final version (to appear in Abh. Math. Semin. Univ. Hambg.)
summary: We establish an extension of Viennot's geometric (shadow line) construction to the setting of oscillating tableaux. We then use this to give a new proof of the Type $C$ analogue of Schensted's theorem on longest decreasing subsequences. This pairs with our results from arXiv:2103.14997v1 [math.RT] on Type $C$ webs to give a direct proof of a result of Sundaram and Stanley: that the dimension of the space of invariant vectors in a $2k$-fold tensor product of the vector representation of $\mathfrak{sp}_{2n}$ equals the number of $(n+1)$-avoiding matchings of $2k$ points.

AI.tldr: 该论文扩展了Viennot的几何构造到振荡杨表，并给出了C型Schensted定理的新证明，结合之前关于C型webs的研究，直接证明了Sundaram和Stanley关于sp_{2n}向量表示张量积中不变向量空间维数的结果。
AI.motivation: 研究振荡杨表的几何构造，为C型李代数sp_{2n}的张量积不变向量空间维数提供新的直接证明方法，连接组合数学与表示论。
AI.method: 扩展Viennot的阴影线几何构造到振荡杨表，利用这一构造给出C型Schensted定理的新证明，结合之前关于C型webs的研究结果。
AI.result: 成功建立了振荡杨表的几何构造，给出了C型Schensted定理的新证明，并直接证明了Sundaram和Stanley的结果：sp_{2n}向量表示在2k重张量积中不变向量空间的维数等于2k个点的(n+1)-avoiding匹配数。
AI.conclusion: 通过扩展Viennot几何构造到振荡杨表，建立了组合数学与表示论之间的新联系，为C型李代数的表示理论提供了新的组合视角和证明方法。
